actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Agricultural Production and Stabilization of Prices

official_title: A bill to amend the National Wool Act of 1954 to provide that the reduction in the support price for wool and mohair programs do not apply to households who are participating, or are eligible to participate, in the food stamp program, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the National Wool Act of 1954 to provide that the reduction in the support price for wool and mohair and the scheduled elimination of the wool and mohair programs do not apply, until December 31, 1997, to households who are in, or eligible to be in, the food stamp program.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Wool Act of 1954 to provide that the reduction in the support price for wool and mohair programs do not apply to households who are participating, or are eligible to participate, in the food stamp program, and for other purposes.
